snippet.title: Grub Truck - Official Trailer | New Indie Business Game
snippet.description:
🚚 Calling all Food Truck entrepreneurs!

👆 Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2733690/Grub_Truck/

As the mastermind behind your Grub Truck business, you'll strategise the perfect layout, design mouthwatering menus, and serve hungry customers. 
Navigate diverse customer quirks, tackle unexpected events, and wrangle financial twists. Your road to food truck fame starts now—serve your way to culinary success!

⚫ Unlock Multiple Locations: Level up and unveil new hot spots across Chestnut Ridge for your Grub Truck business.
⚫ Customise your Ride: Opt for a minimalist food truck or go all-in with cutting-edge tech!
⚫ Satisfy Every Palate: Serve a diverse array of customers, each with unique food preferences and spending habits.

=============================================================

✅ Join the community:
🤖 Discord - https://discord.gg/eMVsRU7PdF
🐦 X (Twitter) - https://twitter.com/StowStudios
🕰️ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@stowstudios

🎤 Voiceover Artist - Alex V [wgcproductions]

#grubtruck #foodtruck #foodtruckgame #gaming #games #trailer #gametrailer #managementgame #businessgame #stowstudios
